alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 7:28PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Twin Falls, northwestern Jerome, southeastern Elmore, eastern Owyhee and southern Gooding Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 727 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Hagerman, or 22 miles southwest of Gooding, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jerome, Gooding, Buhl, Wendell, Hagerman, Bliss, and Castleford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
